summary: The brutal stabbing murder of a justice-of-the-peace sparks an investigation of dark family secrets in a sleepy small town in Southern California.
cast: Glenn Corbett|Patricia Breslin|Eugenie Leontovich|Alan Bunce|Richard Rust|James Westerfield|Gilbert Green|Joan Marshall|Wolfe Barzell|Teri Brooks|William Castle|Joseph Forte|Ralph Moody|'Snub' Pollard|Hope Summers
title: Homicidio
